create_tournament.success: Tournament created with the acronym `%1`, the name `%2` and the bracket_name `%3`.
create_tournament.tournament_already_created: This server already has a tournament running. If you want to create a new one, please end this one with the `%0end_tournament` command. You can also add new brackets with `%0create_bracket <bracket_name>`.

end_tournament.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to end the tournament ? If yes, react to **this** message with :white_check_mark:, else react with :negative_squared_cross_mark:.

reaction_on_end_tournament_message.success: Tournament ended successfully. You can now create a new one.
reaction_on_end_tournament_message.refused: You refused to end the tournament.
